nodes.text: The Imperial Internal Affairs Outpost was an outpost utilized by the Galactic Empire's Internal Affairs on Dendada XVII during the Galactic Civil War. After being sentenced to execution for incompetence of command on Eadu, Yavin and Someilk, Lieutenant Magna Tolvan was taken to the Imperial Internal Affairs Outpost for the execution. However, she was saved when she was informed that she had been reassigned to the Inspectorate.
